name: This Is Not My Beautiful House Sample
name_original: This Is Not My Beautiful House Sample
description:
This Is Not My Beautiful House is an intimate interactive spoken word digital and physical installation. Using a hand-made dolls house and soundscapes, players of 1-4 investigate generational memory, trauma and truth. You have 20 minutes to investigate 4 out of a total of 16 rooms - choose truths or lies to decide what really happened. In this prototype, 3 rooms are available to play.

This is being developed with support from the Creative Youth Foundation as a part of my being selected for the Creative Youth Development Award. I am being mentored by Jeff Tanton, VP Creative/Creative Director at Mediatonic for the digital game, and will be working with a professional fabricator to create the physical installation. The piece is being developed with accessibility at its core, having audio description, neurodivergence-friendly interactivity, and not being restricted to people who can physically travel to the piece.
